topics.body:
*Copyed from my text to a friend*

My grandma was throwing bloody rags at me this morning for fun, then
"My aunt" is sulking 
Then "my aunt" starts flipping out over a joke
Then she's screaming in the hallway 
Then trying to hit herself in the face

So I have to stop her
And she starts crying and screaming in the corner and trying to hurt herself. She's then calls me john and says I'm hurting her... 
Then my grandmother comes and starts hitting and scratching my face and her shitty dogs are freaking out.
So after keeping "my aunt" from smashing her head, I have to deal with my grandmother trying to threaten me and kick me outside.
At this point I'm getting very angry. 

So I get my grandma to fuck off and now I'm dealing with the fucking mental person. But she refuses to look at me because I'm "john" and I'm trying to make her do bad things. So the hallway is getting blazing hot and she thinks it's a closet and now I need to move her but she won't. 
After hours of talking to her I get her to move in the kitchen and then my real Aunt got him.
So then I leave and now I'm home and I'm going to sleep real soon
